text.autoconfig.LootCrates.title: Modular Loot Crates Configuration
text.autoconfig.LootCrates.option.ChestC:
How long Loot Crates take to break. <1 makes them indestructible.Obsidian has 50. 150 makes them very much breakable, but taking ages.
Long enough to be not breakable by accident, but still possible to remove them if they are in the way somehow.
Whether chest and shulker loot crates should keep their inventory when broken. Otherwise they will drop their contents just like broken chests
Chest Crates retain their inventory when broken
text.autoconfig.LootCrates.option.Shulke: Shulker Crates retain their inventory when broken
text.autoconfig.LootCrates.option.LootBa: Loot Barrels retain their inventory when broken
text.autoconfig.LootCrates.option.Replac: Convert vanilla treasure chests to Loot Crates
Worldgen placed Loot Crates generate loot once per player
Worldgen placed Loot Crates restock time in ticks
Dimensions that are excluded from Loot Crate replacement
